txt.en: After the recent attack on Wakenflood, tensions are high at this outpost. The commander wishes to deflect future attacks from Easterlings by ousting the scouts who prowl the bounds.

'Well, you are off to a fine start if you wish to gain favour in Harwick, [placeholder], but I am not through with you yet.

'Your next duty is to report to Wakenflood, and ensure that all is well up at the tower. I will put in a good word for you to Harding next time I see him.

'It will take you a bit longer to earn enough of his trust to receive a welcome in Harwick, but these things do take time. He is a practical man, our Reeve.'
Sergeant Hubyrt can be found at Wakenflood.\n\nYou should find Sergeant Hubyrt and offer your help to him.

'Hail, stranger! I am Sergeant Hubyrt; the men of Wakenflood report to me. I am glad to see a new face -- my warriors were forced to defend our outpost as it was attacked by Easterlings last night, and our strength has waned.

'One of my soldiers ventured out this morning and beheld a large encampment of our enemies at the Anduin's edge, but he had to hasten back, for the Easterlings had the same idea.

'Their scouting party is a formidable one, and my man could not face them and survive. They will be able to report our weaknesses unchecked, and we will soon have a great disadvantage, if they are not stopped.'
Easterling scouting parties can be found between Wakenflood and the Easterling encampment at the Anduin's edge.\n\nYou should find and defeat an Easterling scouting party.
Sergeant Hubyrt is at Wakenflood, attempting to hold a badly weakened outpost.\n\nYou should return to Sergeant Hubyrt with news of the scouting party you defeated.

'I cannot believe you were able to defeat that party of Easterling scouts! They were a formidable lot, and even the Rohirrim fled before them.\n\n'This was a great deed to prove your strength, [placeholder]. Perhaps one brave [placeholder] can help Wakenflood endure this siege. Is there truly hope for us?'
Find and defeat an Easterling scouting party
Return to Sergeant Hubyrt of Wakenflood
